dublin_core.dcvalue: Telemedicine is a way to support health care delivery in remote areas With our telemedicine project the Institute of Tropical Medicine Antwerp Belgium intended to facilitate the introduction of antiretroviral therapy ART for patients affected by Human Immunodeficiency Virus HIV and Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome AIDS in developing countries providing training distance support and education to healthcare providers working in those settings
Studies in health technology and informatics
Telemedicine for HIV/AIDS Care in Low Resource Settings.
